mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kelley, Benjamin F. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin F.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Nov 1 1861. By Telegraph from Romney 1 1861. You will cause the arrest of Jonathan Fuller wagon master of the Eighth Ohio & return him here with such property as he has in his possession as it is supposed he has some taken from here without authority of much value. Left New Creek this morning Brig Genl Kelley by Col Masn cmdg 411Bn148pd [ page 2] Jonathan Fuller
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin F.
Romney, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
